question: Medtronic Voluntarily Recalls Specific Lots of Paradigm® Quick-Set® Infusion Sets In The United StatesMon, 13 Jul 2009 09:15:00 -0500Medtronic, Inc. has initiated a recall of specific lots of Quick-set® infusion sets that are used with MiniMed Paradigm insulin pumps. An infusion set is a thin plastic tube used to deliver insulin from an insulin pump to a diabetes patient, and is typically replaced by the patient every three days.The link is:http://www.fda.gov/Safety/Recalls/ucm171588.htmJust thought I would pass it on;  Amy
title: MiniMed Paradigm insulin Pumps.....recall notice
